name: Project Ultra (Abdelrahman Ameen)
description:
Project Ultra is a Sci FI third-person shooter that takes place in the far future where you are a cybernetic military robot who is trying to escape his makers and master his abilities to defend himself and citizens from others like him on  your way you will discover your various abilities and unlock various skins and weapons as well

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Currently, there is only multiplayer it requires steam to be running in the background

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

soon there will be a campaign and multiple game modes to play with friends  to play

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
